tiddler.title: LibraryUsageHelp
tiddler.pre: You can pick tiddlers to include from any of the following sources (libraries): * ''static'': Tiddlers that have been defined in XML files included with your giewiki installation. * ''local'': Any page in your site that has been tagged 'library'. * ''giewiki'': A shared library located at http://plugins.giewiki.appspot.com * ''other'': One or more url's listed in AdvancedOptions. The pages from which this page includes tiddlers are listed below the Template / includes line.
